channel.title: Another Stupid 'How do I learn Java?' Topic by me
channel.description:
A good few months ago I bought that Java book. It helped to a certain extent. Just glancing at it now I only managed to get up to the chapter entitled 'Arranging Components on a User Interface'. I see people like frank_, SL ect develop their skills very, very quickly.
What I want to do with Java isn't to do anything related with RuneScape cheating, or RuneScape what-so-ever. I want to use Java to make programs that help people. Maybe Java isn't the correct language to be doing that in? Idk. If anyone can help me, it would be appreciated...

item.title: Another Stupid 'How do I learn Java?' Topic by me
item.dc:creator: @pizza_pie pizza pie
item.description:
@pizza_pie wrote:

Silver Lining:

I learned by attempting to make the fastest class parser I could without losing any data.

How would you go about doing that?

Read full topic
item.source: Another Stupid 'How do I learn Java?' Topic by me

item.title: Another Stupid 'How do I learn Java?' Topic by me
item.dc:creator: @Iamadam Iamadam
item.description:
@Iamadam wrote:

[quote=“Silver Lining, post:13, topic:127863”]I learned by attempting to make the fastest class parser I could without losing any data.[/quote]I did that too. It’s great to understand the inner workings of class files as well

Read full topic

I learned by attempting to make the fastest class parser I could without losing any data.

item.source: Another Stupid 'How do I learn Java?' Topic by me

item.title: Another Stupid 'How do I learn Java?' Topic by me
item.dc:creator: @ronny.m.p ronny.m.p
item.description:
@ronny.m.p wrote:

Sun has great documentation. I’m learning right now. It’s a lot of text but it is worth it and you read it over a few days.

Link: http://java.sun.com/docs/books/tutorial/java/index.html

Start from the top and work down. Press the next bottem on the bottem of a page to go to the next page. Read the first chapter even if you know OOP!

Read full topic
item.source: Another Stupid 'How do I learn Java?' Topic by me

item.title: Another Stupid 'How do I learn Java?' Topic by me
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

Mr. Chris,
Perhaps maybe, reading chapters of your book, practicing them for a week, move on. Etc.
But, practice is the best. Set programs you don’t know how to make, and research etc.

Read full topic
item.source: Another Stupid 'How do I learn Java?' Topic by me

item.title: Another Stupid 'How do I learn Java?' Topic by me
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

pizza, a program with a GUI isn’t called a GUI.

From you guys, it looks as if practice and examples are the way to go then. Thanks.

Read full topic
item.source: Another Stupid 'How do I learn Java?' Topic by me

item.title: Another Stupid 'How do I learn Java?' Topic by me
item.dc:creator: @pizza_pie pizza pie
item.description:
@pizza_pie wrote:

lol, my turn:

I learned html to the extend of making a picture appear on a page, then I just started learning Java because I was interested in private servers. Then, I wanted to make simple programs (which I learned were GUI’s) and now I’m here after 5 months of learning Java

Read full topic
item.source: Another Stupid 'How do I learn Java?' Topic by me

item.title: Another Stupid 'How do I learn Java?' Topic by me
item.dc:creator: @1337h4x 1337h4x
item.description:
@1337h4x wrote:

[quote=“lawl, post:2, topic:127883”]l0l, i started out with jsp (somehow) and then when i went to java it was a bit confusing, but got easier as i looked at examples from sun[/quote]I learned html, the js, then tried to learn C++ ( and failed miserable, I was still like 10 ), then attempted jsp, got close to no where, tried java and <3’d it.

Read full topic
item.source: Another Stupid 'How do I learn Java?' Topic by me

item.title: Another Stupid 'How do I learn Java?' Topic by me
item.dc:creator: @pizza_pie pizza pie
item.description:
@pizza_pie wrote:

[quote=“Iamadam, post:6, topic:127863”][me=Iamadam]tries to remember how he learned[/me]

It’s really just down to practice. As you go along, you’ll learn more tricks and ways of making applications more efficient.[/quote]
Yeah that is true…

Just like how he just taught me how to make my code a little simpler and cleaner…
PS: I dont want to change because I already made the tut

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

I learned swing fist, i baught a 800+ page book and flipped through and saw a window and a button and it said ‘making buttons’ ever sense then i have been developing with swing. And using other methods for other things.

item.source: Another Stupid 'How do I learn Java?' Topic by me

item.title: Another Stupid 'How do I learn Java?' Topic by me
item.dc:creator: @wixter wixter
item.description:
@wixter wrote:

You haft to be moderatly interested in the language you wish to learn, id suggest reading the whole book, or find a way other than reading to learn, maybe videos, you haft to stick with it, you cant just become a master at java over night.

Read full topic
item.source: Another Stupid 'How do I learn Java?' Topic by me

item.title: Another Stupid 'How do I learn Java?' Topic by me
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

[quote=“lawl, post:1, topic:127883”][quote author=Mr.Chris link=topic=178509.msg1633738#msg1633738 date=1185648087]
A good few months ago I bought that Java book. It helped to a certain extent. Just glancing at it now I only managed to get up to the chapter entitled ‘Arranging Components on a User Interface’. I see people like frank_, SL ect develop their skills very, very quickly.

What I want to do with Java isn’t to do anything related with RuneScape cheating, or RuneScape what-so-ever. I want to use Java to make programs that help people. Maybe Java isn’t the correct language to be doing that in? Idk. If anyone can help me, it would be appreciated…
[/quote]
its bad that you have the idea that java is made for runescape[/quote]

I only said that because that is what the forum is based on. So normally people would think ‘he wants to learn about Java and how it is used to cheat RuneScape’.

Read full topic

item.title: Another Stupid 'How do I learn Java?' Topic by me
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

Read the java tutorials sun offer, and just practice making the programs they give for you as an example and incorporate other things they teach you into your programs.

Read full topic
